title: The Awesome Adventures of Captain Spirit

notes: Did not work with Steam Play, but I was able to play the entirety of the game using Lutris+DXVK with very decent performance. https://lutris.net/games/the-awesome-adventures-of-captain-spirit/
title: The Awesome Adventures of Captain Spirit

notes:
Tried with these start up options: 
PROTON_VARIABLE=1 %PROTON_NO_D3D11%
PROTON_VARIABLE=1 %PROTON_USE_WINED3D%
Also in 'Offline mode' and disabling "Steam Cloud' saving, most I got was about 2 minutes of game play
